title: CS Practical Competency Enhancement: Simulation for Improving Structural Reliability of Deep-Sea Manned Submersible Pressure Chambers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain design principles of pressure chamber structures in deep-sea high-pressure environments
Learners can simulate structural reliability assessment processes using neural network models and optimization algorithms
Learners can propose optimization methods for geometric parameters of spherical shell structures based on data reliability indices

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
